author: @Squatch_11
text: Be careful with some of those Python courses. A lot of them haven't been updated in years and the syntax is way out of date. If you are new to Python, you'll probably have a hard time figuring out why your code isn't working if you are trying to follow along with the instructor. Make sure to read recent reviews of all courses you are interested in buying.
